source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_SEQ_00<tab>Alisaie may not have the best plan, but she has the only one.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_SEQ_00<tab>План Ализе не безупречен, но на данный момент он — единственный.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_SEQ_01<tab>Your efforts to wreak havoc on the Isle of Zekki and draw the Red Kojin away from their imperial masters have exceeded all expectations. Unfortunately, for reasons beyond your knowing, two of the sacred treasures stored in the isle's vault “reacted” to the presence of the Yasakani<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Magatama, summoning forth from the aether the great kami Susano─a primal by another name. Though you and your comrades initially fled to safety, it is plain that you cannot simply leave the kami be, and so Alisaie bids you return to the vault and do what you do best.

TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_SEQ_02<tab>Before the vault door, you steel yourself for the impending confrontation. How fortunate that you had the wisdom and foresight to invite several of your fellow adventurers on this journey to the Far East, and how kind they were to agree to help you torment the Red Kojin, for no single warrior, no matter how blessed or powerful, could ever hope to slay a primal on <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> own, despite what some wandering minstrels would have you believe.

※The Pool of Tribute can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_SEQ_03<tab>The great kami is no more, and once again you part ways with your stalwart adventurer comrades, ever close at hand yet all too often forgotten. Alisaie and Lyse should not be hard to find─you need only listen for the sounds of battle.

TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_SEQ_04<tab>You find your comrades still locked in combat with the Kojin of the Red. Alas, what the beastmen lack in individual strength they make up for in numbers. For each that falls, three emerge to fill the gap. Before you can join the fray, however, Alisaie steps forward, resolved to provide you and Lyse with an opening in which to escape. Grudgingly, you accept her invitation and depart for Isari, where it would seem the Confederacy have already begun their attack.

TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_SEQ_05<tab>No sooner have you reached the beach south of Isari than Lyse declares her intention to return to the Isle of Zekki and help Alisaie. Though it was she who encouraged you to leave your young friend in the first place, the thought of losing another ally is more than she can bear...as is the shock of hearing Alisaie's voice coming from right behind her. Lyse whirls around and embraces the bemused girl, whose protests fall on deaf ears. Once all present have regained their composure, you press on to Isari.

TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_SEQ_06<tab>Upon arriving in the village, you find no sign of the imperials, nor of any significant struggle. Did the Confederacy keep their end of the bargain, or did Yotsuyu and her men simply move on to the next settlement?

target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_TODO_00<tab>Вскройте дверь хранилища.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_TODO_01<tab>Confront Susano in the Pool of Tribute.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_TODO_01<tab>Бросьте вызов Сусано в испытании «Дань уважения».

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_TODO_02<tab>Confront Susano in the Pool of Tribute.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_TODO_02<tab>Бросьте вызов Сусано в испытании «Дань уважения».
TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_TODO_03<tab>Поговорите с Лиз.
TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_TODO_04<tab>Поговорите с Лиз.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_000<tab>We'll get through this, somehow! After all, we always do!
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_000<tab>Мы прорвёмся — как-нибудь, но прорвёмся! Мы всегда так делаем!

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_010<tab>As before, our numbers limit our options. I wish I could claim to have a brilliant plan, but I don't─all I have is a desperate one.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_010<tab>Как и прежде, наше количество ограничивает доступные нам опции. Хотелось бы мне заявить, что у меня есть блестящий план, но увы — только отчаянный.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_011<tab>Lyse, you and I will do our best to draw the Kojin away from the primal. We'll lead them on a wild-dodo chase all over this isle.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_011<tab>Лиз, мы с тобой на пределе своих возможностей попытаемся отвлечь кодзинов от праймала. Заставим их гоняться за нами по всему острову.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_012<tab>The rest of the plan, I'm afraid you can guess. I'm sorry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I truly am, but neither of us can even approach Susano, much less hope to defeat him. Which means you're on your own.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_012<tab>Насчёт второй части плана, полагаю, ты уже догадываешься. Прости, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, правда, но из нас только ты можешь бросить вызов Сусано — и притом иметь шанс его одолеть. Ты пойдёшь <var 08 E905 ((одна)) ((один)) /var>.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_013<tab>Well, who knows? <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> does have an awful lot of adventurer friends. Maybe some of them decided to take a fishing trip to the Far East, and are surprisingly close by...?
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_013<tab>Ну, кто знает?.. У <var 08 E905 ((неё)) ((него)) /var> масса друзей среди искателей приключений. Может, кто-нибудь из них выбрался на спонтанную рыбалку на Дальний Восток и совершенно случайно оказался поблизости?..

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_014<tab>Yes, and I speak fluent Hingan. Come on, there's no point putting this off!
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_014<tab>И да, я неплохо разговариваю по-хингански. Давай, хватит откладывать!
TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_VILLAGERA02489_000_020<tab>Ох... Моя спина, моя спина...

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_VILLAGERB02489_000_025<tab>Don't hurt me, please! I swear, I didn't do anything!
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_VILLAGERB02489_000_025<tab>Не надо, пожалуйста! Клянусь, я ничего не сделал!..

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_PIRATE02481_000_030<tab>Heh heh. Saw the smoke, did you?
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_PIRATE02481_000_030<tab>Хе-хе. Увидели дым, да?

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_040<tab>I think we're safe. I didn't see any Kojin following us...
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_040<tab>Полагаю, мы в безопасности. Вроде, кодзины отстали.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_041<tab>Wait here. I'm going back for Alisaie.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_041<tab>Жди здесь. Я возвращаюсь за Ализе.
TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_Q1_000_042<tab>Что вы скажете?
TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_A1_000_043<tab>Я пойду с тобой.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_A1_000_044<tab>She stayed behind so we could escape...
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_A1_000_044<tab>Она осталась там, чтобы мы сбежали...
TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_045<tab>Нет. Это не обсуждается.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_046<tab>She stayed behind so that <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> could escape. Even I know that.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_046<tab>Она осталась, чтобы <var 1A 02 /var>ты<var 1A 01 /var> <var 08 E905 ((сбежала)) ((сбежала)) /var>. Даже я об этом знаю.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_047<tab>So that <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> could escape, not me. And that was a mistake─I should've been the one to stay behind, not her.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_047<tab>Ты, а не я. И это было очередной ошибкой — это я должна была остаться там, а не она.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_048<tab>So I've got to go back. If we lose her...I'll never forgive myself.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_048<tab>Так что я возвращаюсь. Если я её потеряю... то никогда себе не прощу.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_049<tab>...I was the one who dragged you all into this. It was my fight, not yours. I knew that from the start, but I also knew I couldn't do it alone.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_049<tab>...Это я всех вас сюда затащила. Это был мой бой, а не ваш. Я знала это с самого начала, но ещё о том, что не смогу справиться одна.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_050<tab>But I've asked too much and let too much happen to you all. I have to make this right─and I have to do it on my own.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_050<tab>Но я попросила слишком о многом, теперь я понимаю. Я должна сделать всё правильно — сама.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_051<tab>So let me go, please. I'm asking you as a friend. I have to help her!
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_051<tab>Так что прошу, позволь мне пойти. Прошу тебя как <var 08 E905 ((подругу)) ((друга)) /var>. Я должна ей помочь!

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_052<tab>You can start by finding me a towel and some bandages. Brrr...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_052<tab>Хочешь помочь — так найди мне полотенце и пару бинтов.
Бр-р-р...
TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_053<tab>Ализе!

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_054<tab>What? Why are you looking at me like that? I said I was going to distract them, not make a heroic and ultimately futile last stand. Who does that, anyway?
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_054<tab>Чего? Что ты так смотришь? Я сказала, что собираюсь отвлечь их, а не героически пожертвовать собой, сражаясь до последнего. Кто на такое вообще купится?

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_055<tab>For the love of─ This is stupid! You're embarrassing yourself! And me!
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_055<tab>Клянусь всеми... Это глупо! Ты позоришься! И я заодно...

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_056<tab>Shut up and let me have this.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_056<tab>Заткнись и сделай мне одолжение.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_057<tab>Right. That wasn't so bad, was it? Now then, we need to hurry back to Isari!
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_057<tab>Ну ладно. Не так уж и ужасно, да? А теперь поторопимся назад, к Исари!

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>They didn't follow you, did they? I gave you enough time to escape?
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>Так они за вами не бросились? Я дала вам достаточно времени, чтобы сбежать?

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>Good to hear my selfless act of heroism achieved the desired effect. You needn't worry, by the way─I'm not intending to make a habit of this.
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>Отрадно знать, что мой акт героизма добился нужного эффекта. Не надо волноваться, кстати — это не войдёт в привычку.

source: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_070<tab>I don't see any soldiers... Do you think the Confederacy drove them off?
target: TEXT_STMBDA313_02489_LYSE_000_070<tab>Не вижу ни одного солдата... Думаешь, Конфедерация уже выкурила их?
